name: Bipole IV: Liberation of Xuir
description:
Bipole IV: Liberation of Xuir is a tactical RPG with over 50 playable characters, a story that changes depending on your actions, and 10 possible endings. You play as Proton Xurr, a Proto-Xuir who escaped from the Shadow Realm as a child. Decades later, you must return to the Shadow Realm to retrieve the Holy Itucher and save the world. 

Gameplay

The game features turn-based tactics gameplay with several unlockable skills for each character. Your actions, both during gameplay and during cutscenes, will drastically alter the story, leading to many different character interactions and endings per playthrough.  Characters who are defeated are permanently dead, which may affect your adventure's outcome.

Between battles, you may unlock Bonus Conversations between your characters. These are additional cutscenes that occur when your characters have survived, which reward extra EXP and provides extra insight into the characters.

Requirements
-Python (3.0.0+)
